main event: A bright orange disc-shaped object was observed in Tucson, Arizona on September 6, 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed at approximately 16:55 MST and lasted for 2.5 minutes., The object was described as being bright orange and disc-shaped., It descended towards the observers and then ascended out of sight., The witness was a credible member of the community, an ex-congressional officer., There was no proposed explanation for the sighting, such as meteorological phenomena or known aircraft.
witness description: Mrs. Agnes Moore, described as reputable and having extensive business interests.
